name: Tales of Anturia: Hejstos
description:
The Root Council has sent you to the icy wastes of Hejstos to find an artifact that will unite the tribes and end the fratricidal struggle. Experience an incredible adventure in this third-person RPG focused on combat and exploration.

You have been sent to an icy wasteland that conceals traces of ancient peoples.

In these ruins, you must find the clues to recover the Iron Crown, which will finally unite the people of Hejstos and enable them to defend themselves against the orc invasion.

If you enjoy RPGs focused on exploration, combat, and character development, you will feel right at home.

Hejstos is a harsh, mountainous province located to the east of Elion, separated only by a large river from the orc lands. Two chieftains, Dognar and Garnarok, are fighting for control of the land.

There is one way to stop this civil war, and you have been sent to reclaim it.
